title: You
description: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.

title: FOREVER
description: Two commitment-phobic people with an intense attraction must navigate a complex journey to love, as they question whether their feelings will last forever.

title: Black Mirror
description: This sci-fi anthology series explores a twisted, high-tech near-future where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: Havoc
description: After a drug deal gone wrong, a bruised detective must fight his way through a criminal underworld to rescue a politician's estranged son.

title: Heart Eyes
description: After a chance encounter on the beach, two teens develop an emotional connection despite their vast socioeconomic differences.

title: Exterritorial
description: While investigating a high-profile murder, a blazingly efficient detective uncovers shocking corruption in the heart of Tel Aviv.
